item.g:title: Fussbett
item.g:description:
A strap, a buckle and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the original Birkenstock sandal - the Madrid. An iconic slide with an amplified buckle accent. Shown in nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: one strap with an individually adjustable metal tongue buckle “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1023390 product description

item.g:description:
A strap, a buckle and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the original Birkenstock sandal - the Madrid. Available in vegan materials and includes an upper made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material, Birkibuc.

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description:
BIRKENSTOCK has given the classic Florida model a new lease on life. Thanks to the three slender straps that can be adjusted, the sandal offers a customizable fit. The upper is made of skin-friendly, hard-wearing Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with three individually adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany”

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona Birko-Flor
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style complemented with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. The color-coordinated microfiber footbed liner rounds off the shoe’s look of sophistication. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” product description

BIRKENSTOCK has given the classic Florida model a new lease on life. Thanks to the three slender straps that can be adjusted, the sandal offers a customizable fit. The upper is made of skin-friendly, hard-wearing Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with three individually adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1016765 product description

item.g:title: Colorado Kids
item.g:description:
Colorado K BFDD Best Friends D LightRose The BIRKENSTOCK Colorado is a fan favorite backstrap style with a hook-and-loop fastener for easy wear that is perfect for kids! This colorful dinosaur print is playful yet stylish. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; ankle strap with a hook-and-loop fastener; color-coordinated details “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
Just slip in! The BIRKENSTOCK Oswego is a handy slip-on shoe that will delight both men and women alike. The casual low shoe features elastic inserts which make it easy to put it on and take it off in no time. The flexible rubber sole with a shock-absorbing cork-PU intermediate layer and the padding at the edge of the shaft result in even more comfort. The upper is made from especially soft suede which hugs the foot like a second skin.
Removable, anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: suede Footbed lining: suede Sole: made of natural rubber Footbed “Made in Germany”

item.g:title: Sydney
item.g:description:
Maximum support, stability and a perfect fit! The BIRKENSTOCK Milano offers all that even during rough-and-tumble play thanks to its compact design with ankle straps. The upper is made of the skin-friendly and durable Birko-Flor® synthetic material. The classic sandal shown here has been given a makeover with a sophisticated interplay on contrasting materials. It could easily be mistaken for genuine leather. The colour-coordinated outsole, the footbed and the buckles are rounded off by the shoe's sophisticated style.
Anatomically-shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: microfibre Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an adjustable metal pin buckle; ankle straps “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1022183 product description

Meet the BIRKENSTOCK Oswego. The perfect casual slip-on shoe. With a flexible rubber sole and and unique cork PU midsole for extra shock absorption, stay comfortable all day long. Take these sporty shoes anywhere and everywhere. The upper is made of high-quality, soft natural leather.
Removable, anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: natural leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: made of natural rubber Made in Portugal
Style No. 1021324 product description

item.g:title: Boston
item.g:description:
Boston Shearling Suede Leather
The bolder, the better! This exceptionally cozy version of the Boston clog, a classic BIRKENSTOCK model, is made of real, very high-quality suede. The shearling footbed and strap lining exudes style and keeps feet warm. The perfect shoe for cozy winter evenings by an open fire!
Anatomically formed cork and latex footbed Upper: suede Footbed lining: shearling Sole: EVA Details: shearling, individually adjustable pin buckle in metal “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
Our most classic, versatile clog—now with added traction from a durable rubber outsole to help you get the job done. The Boston Super Grip pairs superior functionality with an easy, slip-on design in smooth natural leather. Complete with legendary BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed that supports you through long hours on your feet.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Natural leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable Cushioned EVA midsole absorbs shock Super Grip rubber outsole for added traction and durability Adjustable strap with metal pin buckle
Style No. 60134 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona Shearling Suede Leather
The popular BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a classic model with two adjustable straps. Featured in genuine high-quality suede – and is now available in an extra cozy version thanks to a soft, bright genuine shearling lining on the anatomically formed cork-latex footbed and straps. These sandals are perfect for chilly, winter evenings.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed with genuine shearling lining Upper: suede Lining: genuine shearling Sole: EVA Details: lambswool-lined straps with two individually adjustable metal pin buckles Shoe width: slim, normal Heel shape: flat product description

item.g:title: Mogami Kids
item.g:description:
Mogami HL Synthetics
The perfect sandal for the playground, exploring forests, running across meadows and jumping into puddles! With the BIRKENSTOCK Mogami, kids are more than ready for small and big adventures thanks to its waterproof footbed and the highly functional sole. The hook-and-loop fasteners also make family excursions less stressful with their easy handling. They also ensure that the sandals remain on the feet – also during boisterous play! The upper is made of a skin-friendly synthetic material comprising hard-wearing elastane lined with felt. It absorbs hardly any moisture and dries quickly.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: synthetic material Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: polyurethane (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop fastener; ankle strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
Our most sought-after clog, the Boston lends a fashion-forward edge to any style. Velvety suede gives the laid-back look classic, every season appeal. Featuring an additional foam layer for cushioning, the soft footbed offers extra comfort plus go-all-day support.
Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Classic suede upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Adjustable strap with metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
Style No. 660461 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona BFBC VEG
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style complemented with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. Available in vegan materials and includes an upper made from Birkibuc, a skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birkibuc Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; color-coordinated outsole; vegan “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:description:
Arizona NU
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. This version with its grained upper boasts a striking yet natural design. The upper is made from high-quality, soft nubuck leather with a tumbled appearance.

item.g:description:
Arizona Split LE/VL
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. Inspired by color-block, this monochrome style features mixed materials on each strap as well as color-coordinated buckles with a textile feel and matte design. The upper is made from high-quality nubuck leather in combination with soft suede.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather; suede Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle with a textile feel “Made in Germany”
product description

Inspired by color-block, this monochrome style features mixed materials on each strap as well as color-coordinated buckles with a textile feel and matte design. The upper is made from high-quality nubuck leather in combination with soft suede.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather; suede Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle with a textile feel “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Kyoto
item.g:description:
KYOTO VL/NU
Introducing the next generation of BIRKENSTOCK. The Kyoto was designed for those who choose to live boldly. The athletic design and suede upper create a seamless silhouette that elevates everyday wear, without sacrificing comfort. The upper is made from especially soft suede and high-quality nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: suede, nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: individually adjustable hook and loop closure “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
Barbados EVA
The BIRKENSTOCK Barbados is a sporty slide design with an embossed upper and logo lettering. Modeled on the cork sandal, this sandal is made from one piece of light, flexible and waterproof molded EVA.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/footbed lining/sole: molded single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Mogami Kids
item.g:description:
Mogami HL Synthetics
The perfect sandal for the playground, exploring forests, running across meadows and jumping into puddles! With the BIRKENSTOCK Mogami, kids are more than ready for small and big adventures thanks to its waterproof footbed and the highly functional sole. The hook-and-loop fasteners also make family excursions less stressful with their easy handling. They also ensure that the sandals remain on the feet – also during boisterous play! The upper is made of a skin-friendly synthetic material comprising hard-wearing elastane lined with felt. It absorbs hardly any moisture and dries quickly.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: synthetic material Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: polyurethane (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop fastener; ankle strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description:
Madrid BF
The original BIRKENSTOCK Sandal. A strap, a buckle, and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the Madrid. Showcasing simplistic design and a little matte sparkle. This version is shown in an icy metallic Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with an adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Mayari
item.g:description:
Mayari BFBC VEG
Jaunty and modern! The BIRKENSTOCK Mayari thong sandal stands out with its flowing look and brings together design and comfort. The color-coordinated outsole rounds off the shoe’s look of sophistication. This popular sandal has been given an update in a new material, with a vegan version now available. It is entirely free of animal products, as verified by independent testing laboratories. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look which boasts a texture and color that could almost be mistaken for real leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® nubuck Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop; vegan; color-coordinated outsole “Made in Germany”
product description

The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. This version with its grained upper boasts a striking yet natural design. The upper is made from high-quality, soft nubuck leather with a tumbled appearance.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Gary
item.g:description:
Gary
The BIRKENSTOCK Gary is a flat lace-up shoe that’s also perfect for wearing without socks thanks to its unlined finish that prevents rubbing. Its natural design is down to the upper made from especially soft suede, which hugs the foot like a second skin.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: suede Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: light sole made from synthetic materials “Made in Portugal”
product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
Arizona Kids BFBC
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona, the classic sandal has been given a new and modern twist for adventurous kids. The upper is made of skin-friendly and hard-wearing Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look. The full-length upper, which can be individually adjusted using two sturdy metal buckles, provides kids’ feet with protection and grip, even when things get boisterous.
Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: Two-strap model, two individually adjustable pin buckles in metal “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Featuring an additional foam layer for cushioning, the soft footbed offers extra comfort plus go-all-day support. The adjustable two-strap look comes in classic, velvety suede to make it a match for any season and every style. Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Suede upper lining Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Florida
item.g:description:
Florida SFB Birkibuc
The BIRKENSTOCK Florida is the ideal sandal for anyone who spends a lot of time on their feet. This three-strap sandal offers good grip and maximum comfort. With its additional foam layer, the soft footbed offers extra comfort and pampers feet – all day long. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look which boasts a texture and color that could almost be mistaken for real leather.
Original BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed; anatomically shaped Upper: Birko-Flor® nubuck Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; soft footbed “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Mogami Kids
item.g:description:
Mogami CL Kids Birko-Flor
The perfect sandal for the playground, exploring forests, running across meadows and jumping into puddles! The BIRKENSTOCK Mogami is the perfect match for adventures of any kind thanks to the waterproof footbed with toe protection and the highly functional sole which is injected to the footbed and upper in two layers. This makes the sandal extremely flexible, slip-resistant and durable in any terrain. This version boasts vibrant colors. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: polyurethane (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable pin buckle; ankle strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
Barbados EVA
The BIRKENSTOCK Barbados is a sporty slide design with an embossed upper and logo lettering. Modeled on the cork sandal, this sandal is made from one piece of light, flexible and waterproof molded EVA.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/footbed lining/sole: molded single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Milano Kids
item.g:description:
Milano EVA The BIRKENSTOCK Milano - a classic back-strap sandal with functional style for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this back-strap sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play!
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable resin pin buckle; backstrap; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

Modeled on the cork original, this back-strap sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play!
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable resin pin buckle; backstrap; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Boston
item.g:description:
Boston NL
Our most sought-after clog, the Boston lends a fashion-forward edge to any style. Handcrafted for quality, featuring smooth natural leather for an elevated look. Complete with legendary BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed for the ultimate in support.
Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Natural leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Adjustable strap with metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
product description

item.g:title: Rotterdam
item.g:description:
Rotterdam MF
Refreshingly sporty! The casual BIRKENSTOCK Rotterdam stands out with its practical hook-and-loop fasteners and chunky clip fastener. This version comes in a sporty look, well-suited for people with an active lifestyle. It characterizes the sandal’s iconic design and the sporting moment. The color-coordinated footbed rounds off the shoe’s look of sophistication. The upper is made from skin-friendly microfiber.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: microfiber Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA, natural rubber Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable fastener; color-coordinated footbed “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Tatacoa
item.g:description:
TATACOA CC Birko-Flor
The BIRKENSTOCK Tatacoa is a variation of the classic Milano and is the perfect sandal for anyone who is on their feet all day. The pin buckles have been replaced by hook-and-loop fasteners and the heel of the sole has been reinforced. Perfect for all active and adventurous BIRKENSTOCK fans. The polyurethane sole is affixed to the footbed in two layers and therefore offers maximum flexibility, grip and durability. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® which was reinterpreted with a futuristic look.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Futura Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: light polyurethane sole (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop fastener; ankle strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description:
Madrid Big Buckle NU
A strap, a buckle and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the original Birkenstock sandal - the Madrid. An iconic slide with amplified buckle accent. Shown in nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: one strap with an individually adjustable metal tongue buckle “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Florida
item.g:description:
Florida SFB BF
The BIRKENSTOCK Florida is the ideal sandal for anyone who spends a lot of time on their feet and sets great store by comfort above and beyond the norm. The anatomically formed original BIRKENSTOCK cork-latex soft footbed with built-in permanently elastic latex cushion ensures outstanding comfort that starts on day one. The upper is made of skin-friendly, hard-wearing Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex soft footbed with integrated permanently elastic latex cushion Upper: Birko-Flor® Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with three individually adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description:
Madrid BB NL
The original BIRKENSTOCK Sandal. A strap, a buckle, and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the Madrid. This version features our popular Big Buckle with an ombre effect – a colorful pastel accent on this otherwise understated sandal. The color-coordinated semi-exquisite footbed is fully lined with soft piumato leather. The upper is made from high-quality aniline leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; semi-exquisite Upper: aniline leather Footbed lining: piumato leather Sole: EVA Details: strap with an individually adjustable pin buckle; color-coordinated footbed “Made in Germany”
product description

The original BIRKENSTOCK Sandal. A strap, a buckle, and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the Madrid. This version features our popular Big Buckle with an ombre effect – a colorful pastel accent on this otherwise understated sandal. The color-coordinated semi-exquisite footbed is fully lined with soft piumato leather. The upper is made from high-quality aniline leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; semi-exquisite Upper: aniline leather Footbed lining: piumato leather Sole: EVA Details: strap with an individually adjustable pin buckle; color-coordinated footbed “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Mayari
item.g:description:
Mayari D-Buckle TEX
The Mayari from BIRKENSTOCK - an elegantly comfortable sandal with adjustable, crisscrossing straps that form a single loop around the toe. Classic support and adjustability, designed beautifully. Here, the classic model comes in the subtle shimmer for the season. And featuring new D-shaped buckles. The upper is made from smooth velvet.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Smooth, velvety upper Footbed lined with smooth leather EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Kyoto
item.g:description:
KYOTO VL/NU
Introducing the next generation of BIRKENSTOCK. The Kyoto was designed for those who choose to live boldly. The athletic design and suede upper create a seamless silhouette that elevates everyday wear, without sacrificing comfort. The upper is made from especially soft suede and high-quality nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: suede, nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: individually adjustable hook and loop closure “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Atacama
item.g:description:
ATACAMA BF
The BIRKENSTOCK Atacama - designed to bring Birkenstock comfort and support to your favorite trail and water based activities. These off-road ready sandals feature a direct attach PU footbed, a rugged PU/TPU outsole for added traction and sturdy hook and loop closures for a secure fit. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped PU footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Futura Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: light polyurethane sole (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop closures “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona BB TX
After party ready. Smooth, velvety fabric gives the Arizona's iconic, two-strap design a subtle shimmer for the season. The soft pink style pairs perfectly with shiny, oversized buckles and a tonal, smooth leather footbed for a luxe look inside and out. Complete with go-all-night comfort from the original contoured BIRKENSTOCK footbed.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Smooth, velvety upper Footbed lined with smooth leather EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with oversized metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
product description

Arizona BB TX
After party ready. Smooth, velvety fabric gives the Arizona's iconic, two-strap design a subtle shimmer for the season. The soft pink style pairs perfectly with shiny, oversized buckles and a tonal, smooth leather footbed for a luxe look inside and out. Complete with go-all-night comfort from the original contoured BIRKENSTOCK footbed.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Smooth, velvety upper Footbed lined with smooth leather EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with oversized metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
product description

item.g:title: Boston
item.g:description:
Boston SL NL Black
Our most classic, versatile clog—now with added traction from a durable rubber outsole to help you get the job done. The Boston Super Grip pairs superior functionality with an easy, slip-on design in smooth natural leather. Complete with legendary BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed that supports you through long hours on your feet.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear
Natural leather upper
Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable
Cushioned EVA midsole absorbs shock
Super Grip rubber outsole for added traction and durability
Adjustable strap with metal pin buckle product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
Arizona EVA The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play!
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal tongue buckle; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Gizeh is our classic thong sandal. Modeled on the cork original, this sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These colorful sandals are shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the garden, or in wellness and spa areas. It's the perfect addition to your classic BIRKENSTOCK sandals. Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

Arizona EVA The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play!
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal tongue buckle; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description:
Meet the brand new Gizeh Big Buckle. This classic thong sandal gets a fresh update with an elegant amplified buckle. This feminine style that's comfortable and easy to wear. The lining of the footbed is covered with soft smooth leather and matches the shoe in color. The upper is made from extra thick, oiled nubuck leather and features an open-selvage finish.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; semi-exquisite Upper: oiled nubuck leather Footbed lining: smooth leather Sole: EVA Details: thong with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Kyoto
item.g:description:
KYOTO NU
Introducing the next generation of BIRKENSTOCK. The Kyoto was designed for those who choose to live boldly. The athletic design and suede upper create a seamless silhouette that elevates everyday wear, without sacrificing comfort. The upper is made from high-quality, soft nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: individually adjustable buckle “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Madrid is a genuine classic that delights the world of fashion with its minimalist design. The Big Buckle version features a large, elegant pin buckle – a fantastic, striking eye-catcher on this otherwise understated sandal. The lining of the semi-exquisite footbed is covered with soft smooth leather and matches the shoe in color. The upper is made from extra thick, oiled nubuck leather with an open-selvage finish. Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; semi-exquisite Upper: oiled nubuck leather Footbed lining: smooth leather Sole: EVA Details: one strap with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; color-coordinated footbed “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Yao
item.g:description:
Yao Balance BFNB Mocha
A geometrically designed strap sandal. The Yao couples style with a touch of luxury and features the iconic BIRKENSTOCK footbed to provide both comfort and flair. Shown in Birko-Flor® nubuck.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed
Upper: Birko-Flor® Nubuck
Footbed lining: suede
Sole: EVA
Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal tongue buckle
“Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Sydney
item.g:description:
Sydney Birko-Flor
The BIRKENSTOCK Sydney has both form and function. With its two simple straps, it covers fashion and comfort. This version features silver-toned buckles and silky sheen finish. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® with a silky sheen.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: adjustable metal tongue buckles “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Gizeh brings legendary comfort and elegant detailing to the thong sandal. This season's design is softened up for spring in light, Graceful Matcha. Complete with an original BIRKENSTOCK cork-latex footbed for all-day support. Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birko-Flor® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible lightweight Thong style with adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Handcrafted for quality, oiled nubuck leather looks distinctly heritage, designed to age over time for a perfectly worn, one-of-a-kind look. Featuring an additional foam layer for cushioning, the soft footbed offers extra comfort plus go-all-day support. Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Oiled leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Milano
item.g:description:
Milano NU Oiled Habana
The Milano sandal adds an adjustable backstrap to its classic, two-strap design, giving you more security and a fit that's just right. Handcrafted for quality, oiled nubuck leather looks distinctly heritage, designed to age over time for a perfectly worn, one-of-a-kind look. Complete with classic BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like adjustable buckle closures and a contoured cork-latex footbed for the ultimate in support.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear
Oiled leather upper
Soft, napa leather footbed lining helps keep you comfortable
EVA sole is flexible and lightweight
Ankle strap, plus two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles
“Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Milano
item.g:description:
Milano BF Black
The BIRKENSTOCK Milano guarantees maximum grip and gives the feet stability in any movement scenario. This is thanks to the slightly more compact upper with two straps and the wide backstrap. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed
Upper: Birko-Flor®
Footbed lining: suede
Sole: EVA
Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; backstrap
“Made in Germany” product description

item.g:description:
Milano BF Black
The BIRKENSTOCK Milano guarantees maximum grip and gives the feet stability in any movement scenario. This is thanks to the slightly more compact upper with two straps and the wide backstrap. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed
Upper: Birko-Flor®
Footbed lining: suede
Sole: EVA
Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; backstrap

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
BARBADOS BLACK EVA
The BIRKENSTOCK Barbados is a sporty slide design with an embossed upper and logo lettering. Modeled on the cork sandal, this sandal is made from one piece of light, flexible and waterproof molded EVA.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA
Upper/footbed lining/sole: molded single piece of EVA
Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight
“Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Tatacoa
item.g:description:
TATACOA Birko-Flor
The BIRKENSTOCK Tatacoa - designed to bring Birkenstock comfort and support to your favorite trail and water based activities. These off-road ready sandals feature a direct attach PU footbed, a rugged PU/TPU outsole for added traction and sturdy hook and loop closures for a secure fit. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped PU footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Futura Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: light polyurethane sole (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop closures; back strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Kalahari
item.g:description:
Kalahari CC Birko-Flor
The BIRKENSTOCK Kalahari is a variation of the classic Milano and is the perfect sandal for anyone who is on their feet all day. The pin buckles have been replaced by hook-and-loop fasteners and the heel of the sole has been reinforced. The Kalahari boasts a high level of comfort and great functionality. This version is designed for BIRKENSTOCK fans who are active and looking for an experience. The non-slip and abrasion-resistant sole promotes a firm footing. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® which was reinterpreted with a futuristic look.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Futura Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: light polyurethane sole (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop fastener; ankle strap “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Smooth natural leather elevates the classic, two-strap look. Complete with legendary BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed for the ultimate in support. Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Natural leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Natural leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Handcrafted for quality, oiled nubuck leather looks distinctly heritage, designed to age over time for a perfectly worn, one-of-a-kind look. Featuring an additional foam layer for cushioning, the soft footbed offers extra comfort plus go-all-day support. Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Oiled leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The often imitated, never duplicated, category-defining, two-strap wonder from Birkenstock. A comfort legend and a fashion staple. With adjustable straps and a magical cork footbed that conforms to the shape of your foot, a truly custom fit is as effortless as the classic design.
Made in Germany Metallic Leather – smooth, high quality leather with a metallic finish Soft Footbed – Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support with an extra layer of super soft foam cushioning, a deep heel cup and roomy toe box; lined with suede Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption Avoid extreme heat Special feature: The soft footbed has an integrated latex foam cushion. So it offers excellent comfort from day one. Upper: Natural leather can be recognized by its untreated surface. BIRKENSTOCK purposely does not treat surface grains and other characteristic features. BIRKENSTOCK uses sturdy leather with a thickness of 2.8 to 3.2 millimeters as upper material. Insole: The flexible leather lining, which is gentle on the skin, nestles up softly against your foot and adjusts to its contour. The open-pored and thus very breathable surface makes for a comfortable foot climate, even during more strenuous physical activity. Footbed material: Cork is a sustainable material extracted from the bark layer of the cork oak. This natural product is insulating and offers very good cushioning. Outsole: EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) is a high-quality, very light, elastic material with extremely good cushioning. As a result, it smooths out slight irregularities in the floor and ensures that every step is softly cushioned. product description

item.g:title: Sydney
item.g:description:
Sydney Birko-Flor
The BIRKENSTOCK Sydney has both form and function. With its two simple straps, it covers fashion and comfort. This version features silver-toned buckles and silky sheen finish. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® with a silky sheen.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: adjustable metal tongue buckles “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Mayari
item.g:description:
MAYARI GRACEFUL TAUPE Birko-Flor
The Mayari from BIRKENSTOCK - an elegantly comfortable sandal with adjustable, crisscrossing straps that form a single loop around the toe. Classic support and adjustability, designed beautifully. Shown in Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed
Upper: Birko-Flor®
Footbed lining: suede
Sole: EVA
Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop
“Made in Germany”
product description

Birko-Flor – durable, synthetic upper material with leather-like finish and soft backing

item.g:description:
GIZEH GRACEFUL TAUPE Birko-Flor
The modern thong sandal from Birkenstock. The Gizeh is an iconic classic with signature support and a refined, minimalist style.
Birko-Flor – durable, synthetic upper material with leather-like finish and soft backing
Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support, a deep heel cup, and roomy toe box; lined with suede
Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption
Avoid extreme heat
Heel shape: flat
“Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Rio Kids
item.g:description: The Rio - a cute and sporty classic from BIRKENSTOCK. This functional style features an ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA, backstrap and our signature footbed for added comfort support. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed in EVA Upper/lining/sole: one-piece EVA Details: shoe molded from a single piece, waterproof, washable, shock-absorbent, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Milano Kids
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Milano - a classic back-strap sandal with functional style for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this back-strap sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play! Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable resin pin buckle; backstrap; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description: The all-time icon, sized down just for kids. Durable and easy to clean, Birko-Flor® gives the two-strap look a classic, leather-like finish. Complete with classic BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like adjustable buckles and a contoured cork-latex footbed to keep little feet comfortably on the move. Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birko-Flor® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Featuring an additional foam layer for cushioning, the soft footbed offers extra comfort plus go-all-day support. The adjustable two-strap look comes in classic, velvety suede to make it a match for any season and every style. Cushioned BIRKENSTOCK soft footbed creates custom support with wear Suede upper lining Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Milano - a classic back-strap sandal with functional style for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this back-strap sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play! item.g:title: Mayari
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Mayari thong sandal is a jaunty model with a toe loop. The impressive combination of design and wearability will see fashion-conscious men and women through the day with elegance and comfort. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look which boasts a texture and color that could almost be mistaken for real leather. Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® nubuck Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Mayari thong sandal is a jaunty model with a toe loop. The impressive combination of design and wearability will see fashion-conscious men and women through the day with elegance and comfort. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look which boasts a texture and color that could almost be mistaken for real leather. Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® nubuck Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description: The modern thong sandal from Birkenstock. The Gizeh is an iconic classic with signature support and a refined, minimalist style. Shown in Birko-Flor®. “Made in Germany” Birko-Flor® – durable, synthetic upper material with leather-like finish and soft backing Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support, a deep heel cup, and roomy toe box; lined with suede Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption Avoid extreme heat product description

Shown in Birko-Flor®. “Made in Germany” Birko-Flor® – durable, synthetic upper material with leather-like finish and soft backing Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support, a deep heel cup, and roomy toe box; lined with suede Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption Avoid extreme heat product description

item.g:title: Florida
item.g:description: The BIRKENSTOCK Florida is the ideal sandal for anyone who spends a lot of time on their feet and sets great store by comfort above and beyond the norm. The anatomically formed original BIRKENSTOCK cork-latex soft footbed with built-in permanently elastic latex cushion ensures outstanding comfort that starts on day one. The upper is made of skin-friendly, hard-wearing Birko-Flor®. Anatomically shaped cork-latex soft footbed with integrated permanently elastic latex cushion Upper: Birko-Flor® Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with three individually adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description: An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. The laid-back look comes in durable Birkibuc® for a brushed, leather-like finish. Complete with legendary BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed for the ultimate in support. Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birkibuc® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Mayari
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Mayari thong sandal is a jaunty model with a toe loop. The impressive combination of design and wearability will see fashion-conscious men and women through the day with elegance and comfort. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in a sophisticated nubuck look which boasts a texture and color that could almost be mistaken for real leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® nubuck Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; toe loop “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. Inspired by color-block, this monochrome style features mixed materials on each strap as well as color-coordinated buckles with a textile feel and matte design. The upper is made from high-quality nubuck leather in combination with soft suede.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: nubuck leather; suede Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle with a textile feel “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
The all-time icon, sized down just for kids. Durable and easy to clean, Birkibuc® gives the two-strap look a brushed, leather-like finish. Complete with classic BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like adjustable buckles and a contoured cork-latex footbed to keep little feet comfortably on the move.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birkibuc® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a true classic that has been impressing with its timeless design for decades. The two-strap fits perfectly on the child's foot - even when romping wildly! The popular sandal has been updated with a material and is now available in a vegan version. It is completely free of animal components, which is checked by independent test laboratories. The upper material is made of the skin-friendly and hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor® in an elegant nubuck look and therefore looks confusingly similar to real leather in terms of texture and colour.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper material: Birko-Flor® nubuck Insole: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; vegan "Made in Germany"
product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Barbados is a sporty mule with a hexagon pattern and logo lettering. It’s perfect for anyone who is looking in particular for function and comfort. Modeled on the cork sandal, this sandal is made from especially light and flexible EVA. This high-quality, odor-neutral synthetic material which has been tested for harmful substances is shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly. It’s therefore perfect for wearing at the beach, in the garden, or in wellness and spa areas.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/footbed lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Barbados
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Barbados is a sporty mule with a hexagon pattern and logo lettering. It’s perfect for anyone who is looking in particular for function and comfort. Modeled on the cork sandal, this sandal is made from especially light and flexible EVA. This high-quality, odor-neutral synthetic material which has been tested for harmful substances is shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly. It’s therefore perfect for wearing at the beach, in the garden, or in wellness and spa areas.

item.g:title: Birki Air
item.g:description:
Safety and comfort all in one: The Birki Air Antistatic counts among our popular clog classics. Identifiable by its raised form, this clog made from antistatic polyurethane offers perfect comfort with maximum safety and firm grip. The large air inlets at the forefoot keep the foot climate permanently fresh. The original BIRKENSTOCK PU footbed supports the natural anatomy of the feet, preventing posture and joint damage and muscle fatigue. It can be replaced if necessary and, like the clog, has been tested in accordance with antistatic requirements. The clog is oil- and grease-resistant. The clog is washable at up to 80° Celsius, while the removable footbed can be washed at temperatures of up to 60° Celsius and can be efficiently disinfected.
Removable, anatomically shaped PU footbed, antistatic and washable at up to 60°C Material: PU (polyurethane) with side air inlets Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: PU (polyurethane), antistatic Antistatic properties product description

item.g:title: London
item.g:description:
A classic Birkenstock look. One of our first close-toe styles, the London’s simplicity shines with clean lines and an adjustable buckled strap.
Anatomically shaped footbed Oiled leather – unique characteristics of the leather are highlighted by a rich oil treatment, develops natural patina over time Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support, a deep heel cup and roomy toe box; lined with suede Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption Avoid extreme heat “Made in Portugal” product description

item.g:title: Milano Kids
item.g:description:
Maximum grip, stability, and a perfect fit! The BIRKENSTOCK Milano offers all of this thanks to its compact design with a backstrap. Modeled on the cork original, this sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. This high-quality, odor-neutral synthetic material which has been tested for harmful substances is shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly. It is therefore perfect for wearing on the beach, in the garden, or in wellness and spa areas.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/footbed lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
ARIZONA DARK BROWN Naturleder
เบอร์เคนสต๊อก เป็นแบรนด์ที่เป็นที่รู้จักในระดับสากล เกี่ยวกับ รองเท้า และ รองเท้าแตะ ที่ดีต่อ สุขภาพ รองเท้าแตะ สุขภาพ มีวัสดุเด่น คือ ไม้ก๊อก และ หนัง มีสไตล์ และ กำลังเป็นที่นิยมทั้งในหมู่ ผู้หญิง และ ผู้ชาย ในขณะนี้
BIRKENSTOCK Arizona เป็น รองเท้าแตะ รุ่นคลาสสิก ที่สร้างความพึงพอใจให้กับทั้ง ชาย และ หญิง มานานหลายทศวรรษ รองเท้าแตะ รูปแบบเรียบง่ายพร้อมสายรัดสองเส้นนี้ หมายถึงการออกแบบที่เหนือกาลเวลา เป็นที่นิยมมายาวนาน เนื่องจากปัจจัยด้านความสะดวกสบาย สีของสายและอะไหล่ ที่สอดประสานกัน เป็นสิ่งที่ทำให้รองเท้าดูมีความหรูหรา ส่วนบนทำจากหนังธรรมชาติที่เป็นมิตรต่อผิวหนัง และ ทนทาน
รายละเอียด: พื้นรองเท้าไม้ก๊อกและลาเท็กซ์ ที่ปรับเปลี่ยนตามรูปเท้า ส่วนบนของรองเท้า: หนังธรรมชาติ ซับเท้า: หนังนิ่ม พื้นรองเท้าส่วนล่าง: ผลิตจาก EVA
รายละเอียด: สายรัดสองเส้น แต่ละเส้นมีหัวเข็มขัดโลหะที่ปรับได้ และมีสีที่เข้ากัน ผลิตในประเทศเยอรมัน product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description: product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona Big Buckle FL
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK with amplified buckle accent - the Arizona Big Buckle. The Big Buckle version features a large, elegant buckle creating a bold yet minimalist design. Shown in oiled nubuck leather.
Anatomically formed cork and latex footbed
Upper: Oiled nubuck leather
Footbed lining: leather
Sole: EVA
Details: double wide straps with large adjustable pin buckles in metal
“Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Milano Kids
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Milano - a classic back-strap sandal with functional style for kids. Modeled on the cork original, this back-strap sandal is made from ultra lightweight and highly flexible EVA. These sandals are shock absorbing, waterproof, and skin-friendly. Wear them at the beach, in the backyard, or by the pool. Sandals for all-day play!
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: one piece molded EVA Details: three straps, each with an individually adjustable resin pin buckle; backstrap; waterproof, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description:
Meet the BIRKENSTOCK Oswego. The perfect casual slip-on shoe. With a flexible rubber sole and and unique cork PU midsole for extra shock absorption, stay comfortable all day long. Take these sporty shoes anywhere and everywhere. The upper is made of high-quality, soft natural leather.
Removable, anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: natural leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: made of natural rubber Made in Portugal
Style No. 1021324 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Maximum support, stability and a perfect fit! The BIRKENSTOCK Milano offers all that even during rough-and-tumble play thanks to its compact design with ankle straps. The upper is made of the skin-friendly and durable Birko-Flor® synthetic material. The classic sandal shown here has been given a makeover with a sophisticated interplay on contrasting materials. It could easily be mistaken for genuine leather. The colour-coordinated outsole, the footbed and the buckles are rounded off by the shoe's sophisticated style.
Anatomically-shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: microfibre Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an adjustable metal pin buckle; ankle straps “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1022183 product description

item.g:title: Sydney
item.g:description:
Maximum support, stability and a perfect fit! The BIRKENSTOCK Milano offers all that even during rough-and-tumble play thanks to its compact design with ankle straps. The upper is made of the skin-friendly and durable Birko-Flor® synthetic material. The classic sandal shown here has been given a makeover with a sophisticated interplay on contrasting materials. It could easily be mistaken for genuine leather. The colour-coordinated outsole, the footbed and the buckles are rounded off by the shoe's sophisticated style.
Anatomically-shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: microfibre Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an adjustable metal pin buckle; ankle straps “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1022183 product description

item.g:title: Buckley
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Buckley is a semi-open moccasin-style clog that’s instantly recognizable as an authentic BIRKENSTOCK original thanks to its thick cork sole. The striking stitching catches the eye. This version comes with our popular Big Buckle. The upper is made from extra thick, oiled nubuck leather with an open-selvage finish.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: oiled nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: one strap with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Gary is a flat lace-up shoe that’s also perfect for wearing without socks thanks to its unlined finish that prevents rubbing. Its natural design is down to the upper made from especially soft suede, which hugs the foot like a second skin.

item.g:title: London
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK London is a variation on the classic Boston shoe. The raised heel section is characteristic of this simple low shoe with no stitching. It boasts a natural, rustic look and an open-selvage, unlined finish. Its natural design is also down to the upper made from especially soft suede, which hugs the foot like a second skin.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: suede Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Portugal” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona Super Grip Birko-Flor
An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Now, added traction from a durable Super Grip outsole lets you wear the classic style on the job. Complete with original BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed to support you through long hours on your feet.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birko-Flor® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable Cushioned EVA midsole absorbs shock Super Grip rubber outsole for added traction and durability Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles product description

An icon of timeless design and legendary comfort, the Arizona sandal has been defining style since 1973. Now, added traction from a durable Super Grip outsole lets you wear the classic style on the job. Complete with original BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed to support you through long hours on your feet.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Birko-Flor® synthetic leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable Cushioned EVA midsole absorbs shock Super Grip rubber outsole for added traction and durability Two adjustable straps with metal pin buckles product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a true classic. Modeled on the cork sandal, it is made from ultra light and highly flexible EVA. The high-quality, odor-neutral EVA has been tested for harmful substances and combines numerous positive attributes. It’s waterproof, ultra lightweight, washable and therefore extremely easy to care for.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed in EVA Upper/lining/sole: one-piece EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”
Style 1024588 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Arizona Birko-Flor
The legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK - the Arizona. Iconic style complemented with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. The color-coordinated microfiber footbed liner rounds off the shoe’s look of sophistication. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona Kids
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a genuine classic that has been delighting wearers with its timeless design for decades. The two-strap model fits kids’ feet perfectly – even during boisterous play! Modeled on the cork sandal, this version is made from EVA. The high-quality, odor-neutral EVA has been tested for harmful substances and combines numerous positive attributes. It is ultra lightweight, highly elasticated, waterproof, skin-friendly – and offers the comfort you have come to expect from BIRKENSTOCK.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany” product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a genuine classic. This individually adjustable unisex two-strap sandal is now available in a uniquely sophisticated leather version. The leather features an open selvedge finish, emphasizing the handcrafted and natural look of these stylish sandals.
Original BIRKENSTOCK footbed: anatomically formed Upper: natural leather Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: strap with two individually adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany”
Style no. 51191 product description

item.g:description:
A strap, a buckle and a contoured cork footbed are masterfully combined to create the original Birkenstock sandal - the Madrid. Available in vegan materials and includes an upper made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material, Birkibuc.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birkibuc Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: a single strap with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; vegan “Made in Germany”

item.g:title: Gary
item.g:description:
Gary
The BIRKENSTOCK Gary is a flat lace-up shoe that’s also perfect for wearing without socks thanks to its unlined finish that prevents rubbing. Its natural design is down to the upper made from especially soft suede, which hugs the foot like a second skin.
Anatomically shaped footbed Upper: suede Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: light sole made from synthetic materials “Made in Portugal”
product description

item.g:title: Kyoto
item.g:description:
KYOTO VL/NU
Introducing the next generation of BIRKENSTOCK. The Kyoto was designed for those who choose to live boldly. The athletic design and suede upper create a seamless silhouette that elevates everyday wear, without sacrificing comfort. The upper is made from especially soft suede and high-quality nubuck leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: suede, nubuck leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: individually adjustable hook and loop closure “Made in Germany”
product description

item.g:title: Bend
item.g:description:
The only sneaker with an original BIRKENSTOCK footbed—the Bend. This season, a special material mix of natural leather and buttery soft nubuck teams up to transform the casual staple into an elevated classic. Through special processing, the underside of nubuck leather is given a velvety soft feel, then turned inside-out to give the upper a luxe look and feel.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Natural leather and nubuck leather upper Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable Natural rubber sole for added traction “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
Style no. 1024850 product description

Upper: Birko-Flor® Lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: an individually adjustable metal buckle, thong Heel shape: flat “Made in Germany”
Style no. 846141 product description

item.g:title: Madrid
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Madrid is a genuine classic that delights the world of fashion with its minimalist design. The Big Buckle version features a large, elegant pin buckle – a fantastic, striking eye-catcher on this otherwise understated sandal. The lining of the semi-exquisite footbed is covered with soft smooth leather and matches the shoe in color. The upper is made from extra thick, oiled nubuck leather with an open-selvage finish.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; semi-exquisite Upper: oiled nubuck leather Footbed lining: smooth leather Sole: EVA Details: one strap with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; color-coordinated footbed “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1024128 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a genuine classic that has been delighting both men and women with its timeless design for decades. The upper is made from high-quality, soft natural leather. This version boasts a sophisticated interplay of materials in the form of an embossing reminiscent of football. Thanks to its two components, the sole promotes stability and comfort. It comprises a cushioning midsole made from EVA and an outsole made from genuine rubber and rounds off the sporty look.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: embossed natural leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: rubber-EVA sole Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; dual-component sole made from EVA and rubber “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1022353 product description

item.g:title: Uji
item.g:description:
A sport-inspired take on the iconic Arizona sandal, the Uji maximizes on-the-go comfort. A suede upper comes together softly over the foot, secured by nubuck hook-and-loop straps for a customized fit. The style is grounded in signature BIRKENSTOCK support, with a cork-latex footbed that shapes to you with wear. Slip on and go.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Suede upper with two nubuck leather hook-and-loop straps Suede footbed lining EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Embossed BIRKENSTOCK logo “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed
Style No. 1024800 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The often imitated, never duplicated, category-defining, two-strap wonder from Birkenstock. A comfort legend and a fashion staple. With adjustable straps and a magical cork footbed that conforms to the shape of your foot, a truly custom fit is as effortless as the classic design.
“Made in Germany” Heel shape: flat Birko-Flor - durable, synthetic upper material with a leather-like finish and soft backing Contoured cork footbed conforms to the shape of your foot and features pronounced arch support, a deep heel cup, and roomy toe box; lined with suede Lightweight EVA sole for cushioning and shock absorption Avoid extreme heat
Style No. 451161 product description

item.g:title: Boston
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Boston is a veritable classic that can easily be worn all year round. The Boston has a legendary status thanks to its sophisticated, individual design. Modeled on the cork sandal, it is made from the ultra lightweight and highly flexible synthetic material EVA. The high-quality, odor-neutral EVA has been tested for harmful substances and combines numerous positive attributes: it is very light, highly elastic, shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1002314 product description

The BIRKENSTOCK Boston is a veritable classic that can easily be worn all year round. The Boston has a legendary status thanks to its sophisticated, individual design. Modeled on the cork sandal, it is made from the ultra lightweight and highly flexible synthetic material EVA. The high-quality, odor-neutral EVA has been tested for harmful substances and combines numerous positive attributes: it is very light, highly elastic, shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1002314 product description

item.g:title: Franca
item.g:description:
A fashion favorite with a new boho spin—the Franca works braids into its strappy, style-forward design. Oiled nubuck leather lends a perfectly lived-in look to the style, designed to age beautifully over time. Complete with classic BIRKENSTOCK design elements, like a contoured cork-latex footbed for the ultimate in all-day support.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Oiled leather upper with braided design Suede footbed lining helps keep you comfortable Lightweight and flexible EVA sole Three straps with adjustable metal pin buckles “Made in Germany” quality stamp on footbed

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona Grip is the legendary two-strap design from BIRKENSTOCK. Iconic style with the signature comfort of the BIRKENSTOCK footbed. This style features a rubber grip sole and a subtle patina made from high-quality, soft natural leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: natural leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA; natural rubber Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle “Made in Germany”

item.g:title: Mogami
item.g:description:
A sandal that can keep up with whatever they get into. Specially designed for kids, the Mogami is durable and easy to clean, with a water-friendly footbed designed for play. A secure backstrap and flexible, traction sole team up to help keep them steady through it all. In a fun, color-blocked design that lets them take their favorite colors on the go.
Water-friendly, PU footbed Birko-Flor® upper with durable polyurethane (PU) coating PU footbed lining PU sole Secure backstrap, plus two straps with adjustable pin buckles Made in Germany
Style no. 1024602 product description

item.g:title: Tatacoa
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Tatacoa - designed to bring Birkenstock comfort and support to your favorite trail and water based activities. These off-road ready sandals feature a direct attach PU footbed, a rugged PU/TPU outsole for added traction and sturdy hook and loop closures for a secure fit. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped PU footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Futura Footbed lining: polyurethane (PU) Sole: light polyurethane sole (PU) Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable hook-and-loop closures; back strap “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1025640 product description

item.g:title: Gizeh
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Gizeh is a genuine classic that combines optimum grip with minimalist, fashionable design. This version comes with our popular Big Buckle. This sandal has been given an update in a new material, with a vegan version now available. It is entirely free of animal products, as verified by independent testing laboratories. The upper is made from a soft fabric.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: fabric Footbed lining: microfiber Sole: EVA Details: thong with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; vegan “Made in Germany”
Style No. 1025522 product description

item.g:title: Milano
item.g:description:
The Milano sandal adds an adjustable backstrap to its classic, two-strap design, giving you more security and a fit that's just right. This modern version features an upper made from aniline leather complemented by brass buckles for a classic look. This Milano is designed with a unique Rubber Grip outsole for added traction and durablity.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: aniline leather Footbed lining: suede Sole: rubber Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; back strap “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1023622 product description

item.g:title: St Barths
item.g:description:
With the St. Barths, BIRKENSTOCK presents a particularly sophisticated and feminine version of the classic Arizona. The two-part outsole facilitates the rolling of the foot and ensures an elegant gait. The premium rectangular zamak buckles with a convex shape perfectly fit the foot and embody a contemporary design. The exquisite footbed is fully lined with soft leather, making it exceptionally comfortable. The upper is made from high-quality, soft natural leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; exquisite Upper: natural leather Footbed lining: natural leather Sole: natural rubber Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; color-coordinated details “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1025267 product description

The premium rectangular zamak buckles with a convex shape perfectly fit the foot and embody a contemporary design. The exquisite footbed is fully lined with soft leather, making it exceptionally comfortable. The upper is made from high-quality, soft natural leather.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed; exquisite Upper: natural leather Footbed lining: natural leather Sole: natural rubber Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; color-coordinated details “Made in Germany”
Style no. 1025264 product description

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Arizona is a genuine classic that has been delighting wearers with its timeless design for decades. The two-strap model fits kids’ feet perfectly – even during boisterous play! This popular sandal has been given an update in a new material, with a vegan version now available. It is entirely free of animal products, as verified by independent testing laboratories. The upper is made from a skin-friendly, synthetic material with a velvety feel.

item.g:title: Arizona
item.g:description:
Oh-so-fluffy teddy shearling and suede transform the Arizona's iconic, two-strap design into the season's be-seen style. Genuine shearling lines the sandal's suede strap for a soft touch, while teddy shearling fluffs up the second strap, lined with suede for a smooth feel. Teddy shearling even pads its contoured footbed for the ultimate cozy finish.
Contoured cork-latex footbed creates custom support with wear Plush, teddy shearling and suede upper Teddy shearling footbed lining helps keep you comfortable EVA sole is flexible and lightweight Two straps with adjustable metal pin buckles Made in Germany

item.g:title: Boston
item.g:description:
The BIRKENSTOCK Boston is a veritable classic that can easily be worn all year round. The Boston has a legendary status thanks to its sophisticated, individual design. Modeled on the cork sandal, it is made from the ultra lightweight and highly flexible synthetic material EVA. The high-quality, odor-neutral EVA has been tested for harmful substances and combines numerous positive attributes: it is very light, highly elastic, shock-absorbent, waterproof, and skin-friendly.
Anatomically shaped BIRKENSTOCK footbed made from EVA Upper/lining/sole: a single piece of EVA Details: waterproof, washable, ultra lightweight “Made in Germany”

item.g:title: Milano
item.g:description:
Maximum grip, stability, and a perfect fit! The BIRKENSTOCK Milano offers all of this thanks to its compact design with an ankle strap – also during boisterous play. Here, we see the sandal with a silky sheen finish. The color-coordinated details round off the shoe’s look of sophistication. The upper is made from the skin-friendly, hard-wearing synthetic material Birko-Flor®.
Anatomically shaped cork-latex footbed Upper: Birko-Flor® Footbed lining: suede Sole: EVA Details: two straps, each with an individually adjustable metal pin buckle; ankle strap; color-coordinated details “Made in Germany”
